SourceString:
Used in Revolvers, Heavy Pistols and other Unorthodox Weapons.

Trades armor penetration for significantly increased kinetic damage.  Highly effective against unarmored targets.
While weapon is equipped, hold the Reload key to select ammo type.
LocalizedString: Когда оружие в руках, удерживайте клавишу перезарядки для выбора типа патронов.
